clean_container.description: Clean the container of the coffee machine.

remove_container.description: Remove the container from the coffee machine.

insert_container.description: Insert the container into the coffee machine.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid of the coffee machine.

remove_lid.description: Remove the lid of the coffee machine.

insert_lid.description: Insert the lid into/onto the coffee machine.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob of the coffee machine.

turn_knob_clockwise.description: Turn the knob of the coffee machine clockwise.

turn_knob_counterclockwise.description: Turn the knob of the coffee machine counterclockwise.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Wipe the coffee machine body to clean it.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the container, lid, knob, and body.

setup_coffee_machine.description: Setup the coffee machine by inserting the container and lid and adjusting the knob.
